tns:patch.author: Diego
tns:patch.description: Add SHA-1 function which is used for user registration

script.lang: CREATE FUNCTION digest(bytea, text) RETURNS bytea AS '$libdir/pgcrypto','pg_digest' LANGUAGE 'C'; CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION sha1(bytea) returns text AS $$ SELECT encode(digest($1, 'sha1'), 'hex') $$ LANGUAGE SQL STRICT IMMUTABLE;
